00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Private_Define EBI LCD private definitions
00051   * @{
00052   */
00053 #if (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_NORMAL)
00054   #define EC (320)
00055   #define EP (240)
00056   #define MAC (0x60)
00057 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_LEFT_90)
00058   #define EC (240)
00059   #define EP (320)
00060   #define MAC (0x00)
00061 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_RIGHT_90)
00062   #define EC (240)
00063   #define EP (320)
00064   #define MAC (0xC0)
00065 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_ROTATE_180)
00066   #define EC (320)
00067   #define EP (240)
00068   #define MAC (0xA0)
00069 #endif
00070 /**
00071   * @}
00072   */
00073 
00074 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Private_Variable EBI LCD private variables
00076   * @{
00077   */
00078 static u16 Color_Text = 0x0000;  // default: Black
00079 static u16 Color_Back = 0xFFFF;  // default: White
00080 /**
00081   * @}
00082   */
00083 
00084 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 static void _delay(u32 nCount);

00090   */
00091 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00092   * @brief  Initialize peripherals used by the EBI LCD driver.
00093   * @retval None
00094   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00095 void LCD_Init(void)
00096 {
00097   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00098      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00099      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00100   */
00101   EBI_InitTypeDef  EBI_InitStructure;
00102 
00103   /*  Enable AFIO clock                                                                                     */
00104   /*  Enable EBI & EBI CS port clock                                                                        */
00105   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00106   #if (LCD_EBI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00107   LCD_EBI_RST_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00108   #endif
00109   #if (LCD_EBI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00110   LCD_EBI_BL_CLK(CKCUClock)  = 1;
00111   #endif
00112   CKCUClock.Bit.EBI          = 1;
00113   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO         = 1;
00114   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00115 
00116   /* Configure EBI pins & LCD RESET pin                                                                     */
00117   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_CS_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_CS_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_CS_AFIO_MODE);
00118   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_OE_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_OE_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_OE_AFIO_MODE);
00119   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_WE_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_WE_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_WE_AFIO_MODE);
00120   #if (SPIDUALOUT_WITH_EBI_8BIT_MODE == 0)
00121   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_RS_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_RS_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_RS_AFIO_MODE);
00122   #else
00123   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_RS1_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_RS1_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_RS1_AFIO_MODE);
00124   #endif
00125   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD0_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD0_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD0_AFIO_MODE);
00126   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD1_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD1_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD1_AFIO_MODE);
00127   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD2_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD2_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD2_AFIO_MODE);
00128   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD3_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD3_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD3_AFIO_MODE);
00129   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD4_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD4_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD4_AFIO_MODE);
00130   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD5_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD5_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD5_AFIO_MODE);
00131   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD6_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD6_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD6_AFIO_MODE);
00132   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD7_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD7_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD7_AFIO_MODE);
00133   #if (LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00134   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD8_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD8_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD8_AFIO_MODE);
00135   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD9_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD9_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD9_AFIO_MODE);
00136   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD10_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD10_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD10_AFIO_MODE);
00137   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD11_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD11_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD11_AFIO_MODE);
00138   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD12_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD12_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD12_AFIO_MODE);
00139   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD13_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD13_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD13_AFIO_MODE);
00140   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD14_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD14_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD14_AFIO_MODE);
00141   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_AD15_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_AD15_AFIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_AD15_AFIO_MODE);
00142   #endif
00143   #if (LCD_EBI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00144   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_BL_AFIO_MODE);
00145   #endif
00146   #if (LCD_EBI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00147   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_ID, LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_PIN, LCD_EBI_RST_AFIO_MODE);
00148   #endif
00149 
00150   /* Set output data of RESET as high                                                                       */
00151   #if (LCD_EBI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00152   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00153   #endif
00154 
00155   /* Configure the direction of BL as output mode                                                           */
00156   #if (LCD_EBI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00157   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00158   #endif
00159 
00160   /* Configure the direction of RESET as output mode                                                        */
00161   #if (LCD_EBI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00162   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00163   #endif
00164 
00165   /*  EBI Configuration                                                                                     */
00166   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_Bank = EBI_BANK_0;
00167   #if (LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00168   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_Mode = EBI_MODE_D16;
00169   #else
00170   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_Mode = EBI_MODE_D8A8;
00171   #endif
00172   #if (LIBCFG_EBI_BYTELAND_ASYNCREADY == 1)
00173   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ByteLane = EBI_BYTELANE_DISABLE;
00174   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_AsynchronousReady = EBI_ASYNCHRONOUSREADY_DISABLE;
00175   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ARDYTimeOut = EBI_ARDYTIMEOUT_DISABLE;
00176   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ByteLanePolarity = EBI_BYTELANEPOLARITY_LOW;
00177   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ReadySignalPolarity = EBI_READYSIGNALPOLARITY_LOW;
00178   #endif
00179   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_IdleCycle = EBI_IDLECYCLE_DISABLE;
00180   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ChipSelectPolarity = EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_LOW;
00181   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_AddressLatchPolarity = EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_LOW;
00182   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_WriteEnablePolarity = EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_LOW;
00183   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ReadEnablePolarity = EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_LOW;
00184   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_IdleCycleTime = 0;
00185   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_AddressSetupTime = 0;
00186   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_AddressHoldTime = 0;
00187   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_WriteSetupTime = 2;
00188   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_WriteStrobeTime = 2;
00189   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_WriteHoldTime = 1;
00190   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ReadSetupTime = 2;
00191   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ReadStrobeTime = 5;
00192   EBI_InitStructure.EBI_ReadHoldTime = 1;
00193   EBI_Init(&EBI_InitStructure);
00194 
00195   EBI_Cmd(EBI_BANK_0, ENABLE);
00196 }
00197 
00198 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00199   * @brief  Configures the LCD by the EBI lcd driver.
00200   * @retval None
00201   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00202 void LCD_Config(void)
00203 {
00204   _delay(10);
00205 
00206   /* RESET LCD                                                                                              */
00207   #if (LCD_EBI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00208   GPIO_ClearOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00209   _delay(10);
00210   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00211   _delay(15);
00212   #endif
00213 
00214   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = 0xE0;  // PLL enable
00215   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = 0x01;
00216   _delay(10);
00217 
00218   /* Driving ability Setting                                                                                */
00219   LCD_WriteReg(0xE2, 0x00);
00220   LCD_WriteReg(0xE4, 0x01);
00221   LCD_WriteReg(0xE5, 0x10);
00222   LCD_WriteReg(0xE6, 0x01);
00223   LCD_WriteReg(0xE7, 0x10);
00224   LCD_WriteReg(0xE8, 0x70);
00225   LCD_WriteReg(0xF2, 0x00);
00226   LCD_WriteReg(0xEA, 0x00);
00227   LCD_WriteReg(0xEB, 0x20);
00228   LCD_WriteReg(0xEC, 0x3C);
00229   LCD_WriteReg(0xED, 0xC8);
00230   LCD_WriteReg(0xE9, 0x38);
00231   LCD_WriteReg(0xF1, 0x01);
00232   LCD_WriteReg(0x2E, 0x89);
00233   LCD_WriteReg(0x29, 0x8F);
00234   LCD_WriteReg(0x2B, 0x02);
00235 
00236   /* Gamma 2.2 Setting                                                                                      */
00237   LCD_WriteReg(0x40, 0x00);
00238   LCD_WriteReg(0x41, 0x00);
00239   LCD_WriteReg(0x42, 0x00);
00240   LCD_WriteReg(0x43, 0x15);
00241   LCD_WriteReg(0x44, 0x13);
00242   LCD_WriteReg(0x45, 0x3f);
00243   LCD_WriteReg(0x47, 0x55);
00244   LCD_WriteReg(0x48, 0x00);
00245   LCD_WriteReg(0x49, 0x12);
00246   LCD_WriteReg(0x4A, 0x19);
00247   LCD_WriteReg(0x4B, 0x19);
00248   LCD_WriteReg(0x4C, 0x16);
00249   LCD_WriteReg(0x50, 0x00);
00250   LCD_WriteReg(0x51, 0x2c);
00251   LCD_WriteReg(0x52, 0x2a);
00252   LCD_WriteReg(0x53, 0x3F);
00253   LCD_WriteReg(0x54, 0x3F);
00254   LCD_WriteReg(0x55, 0x3F);
00255   LCD_WriteReg(0x56, 0x2a);
00256   LCD_WriteReg(0x57, 0x7e);
00257   LCD_WriteReg(0x58, 0x09);
00258   LCD_WriteReg(0x59, 0x06);
00259   LCD_WriteReg(0x5A, 0x06);
00260   LCD_WriteReg(0x5B, 0x0d);
00261   LCD_WriteReg(0x5C, 0x1F);
00262   LCD_WriteReg(0x5D, 0xFF);
00263 
00264   /* Power Voltage Setting                                                                                  */
00265   LCD_WriteReg(0x1B, 0x1A);
00266   LCD_WriteReg(0x1A, 0x02);
00267   LCD_WriteReg(0x24, 0x61);
00268   LCD_WriteReg(0x25, 0x5C);
00269 
00270   /* VCOM offset                                                                                            */
00271   LCD_WriteReg(0x18, 0x36);
00272   LCD_WriteReg(0x19, 0x01);
00273   LCD_WriteReg(0x23, 0x62);
00274   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x88);
00275   _delay(5);
00276   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x80);
00277   _delay(5);
00278   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x90);
00279   _delay(5);
00280   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0xD4);
00281   _delay(5);
00282 
00283   /* 262k or 65k color selection                                                                            */
00284   LCD_WriteReg(0x17, 0x05);
00285 
00286   LCD_WriteReg(0x36, 0x09);
00287 
00288   /* Display ON Setting                                                                                     */
00289   LCD_WriteReg(0x28, 0x38);
00290   _delay(40);
00291   LCD_WriteReg(0x28, 0x3C);
00292 
00293   /* Set GRAM Area                                                                                          */
00294   // Column Start
00295   LCD_WriteReg(0x02, 0x00);
00296   LCD_WriteReg(0x03, 0x00);
00297 
00298   // Column End
00299   LCD_WriteReg(0x04, ((EC - 1) & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00300   LCD_WriteReg(0x05, ((EC - 1) & 0xFF));
00301 
00302   // Row Start
00303   LCD_WriteReg(0x06, 0x00);
00304   LCD_WriteReg(0x07, 0x00);
00305 
00306   // Row End
00307   LCD_WriteReg(0x08, ((EP - 1) & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00308   LCD_WriteReg(0x09, ((EP - 1) & 0xFF));
00309 
00310   /* Show Direction                                                                                         */
00311   LCD_WriteReg(0x16, MAC);
00312 
00313   LCD_Clear(Black);
00314 
00315   _delay(200);
00316 
00317   /* Turn on the back light                                                                                 */
00318   #if (LCD_EBI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00319   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_ID], LCD_EBI_BL_GPIO_PIN);
00320   #endif
00321 }
00322 
00323 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00324   * @brief  Write value to the selected LCD register.
00325   * @param  LCD_Reg_Index: address of the selected register.
00326   * @param  LCD_Reg_Value: value of to write the selected register.
00327   * @retval None
00328   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00329 void LCD_WriteReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index, u32 LCD_Reg_Value)
00330 {
00331   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = LCD_Reg_Index;
00332   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = LCD_Reg_Value;
00333 }
00334 
00335 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00336   * @brief  Read value from the selected LCD register.
00337   * @param  LCD_Reg_Index: address of the selected register.
00338   * @retval EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM
00339   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00340 u16 LCD_ReadReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index)
00341 {
00342   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = LCD_Reg_Index;
00343   return (EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM);
00344 }
00345 
00346 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00347   * @brief  Set the cursor position.
00348   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00349   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00350   * @retval None
00351   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00352 void LCD_StarterSet(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location)
00353 {
00354   LCD_WriteReg(REG6, ((X_Location >> 8) & 0xff));
00355   LCD_WriteReg(REG7, (X_Location & 0xff));
00356 
00357   LCD_WriteReg(REG2, ((Y_Location >> 8) & 0xff));
00358   LCD_WriteReg(REG3, (Y_Location & 0xff));
00359 }
00360 
00361 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00362   * @brief  Prepare to write data to LCD RAM.
00363   * @retval None
00364   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00365 void LCD_WriteRAMPrior(void)
00366 {
00367   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG34;
00368 }
00369 
00370 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00371   * @brief  Write to the LCD RAM.
00372   * @param  RGB_Set: the pixel color in RGB mode (5-6-5).
00373   * @retval None
00374   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00375 void LCD_WriteRAM(u32 RGB_Set)
00376 {
00377   #if (LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00378   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = RGB_Set;
00379   #else
00380   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (RGB_Set >> 8) & 0x00FF;
00381   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = RGB_Set & 0xFF;
00382   #endif
00383 }
00384 
00385 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00386   * @brief  Clear the whole LCD.
00387   * @param  Color: the color to be the background.
00388   * @retval None
00389   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00390 void LCD_Clear(u16 Color)
00391 {
00392   u32 i = LCD_Height * LCD_Width;
00393 
00394   LCD_StarterSet(0, 0);
00395 
00396   /* Prepare to write GRAM                                                                                  */
00397   LCD_WriteRAMPrior();
00398 
00399   while (i--)
00400   {
00401     #if (LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00402     EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = Color;
00403     #else
00404     EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Color >> 8) & 0x00FF;
00405     EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = Color & 0xFF;
00406     #endif
00407   }
00408 }
00409 
00410 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00411   * @brief  Set the background color.
00412   * @param  Color: background color of RGB 5-6-5.
00413   * @retval None
00414   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00415 void LCD_BackColorSet(u16 Color)
00416 {
00417   Color_Back = Color;
00418 }
00419 
00420 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00421   * @brief  Set the text color.
00422   * @param  Color: text color of RGB 5-6-5.
00423   * @retval None
00424   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00425 void LCD_TextColorSet(u16 Color)
00426 {
00427   Color_Text = Color;
00428 }
00429 
00430 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00431   * @brief  Display one character (16 dots width, 24 dots height).
00432   * @param  Line_Num: Where to display the character, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00433   * @param  Column: start column address.
00434   * @param  Ascii: character ascii code, must be between 0x20 and 0x7E.
00435   * @retval None
00436   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00437 void LCD_CharDisplay(u32 Line_Num, u32 Column, u32 Ascii)
00438 {
00439   Ascii -= 32;
00440   LCD_CharDraw(Line_Num, Column, (u16 *)&ASCII_Font_Table[Ascii * 24]);
00441 }
00442 
00443 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00444   * @brief  Disable the Display.
00445   * @retval None
00446   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00447 void LCD_DisplayOff(void)
00448 {
00449   /* Display Off                                                                                            */
00450   LCD_WriteReg(REG40, 0);
00451 }
00452 
00453 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00454   * @brief  Enable the Display.
00455   * @retval None
00456   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00457 void LCD_DisplayOn(void)
00458 {
00459   /* Display On                                                                                             */
00460   LCD_WriteReg(REG40, 0x3C);
00461 }
00462 
00463 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00464   * @brief  Display the maximum 20 characters on one line.
00465   * @param  Line_Num: Where to display the character, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00466   * @param  Sptr: point to the string data.
00467   * @retval None
00468   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00469 void LCD_StringLineDisplay(u32 Line_Num, char *Sptr)
00470 {
00471   u32 i = 0;
00472   u16 reference_column = 0;
00473 
00474   /* Send character by character on LCD                                                                     */
00475   while ((*Sptr != 0) & (i < 20))
00476   {
00477     LCD_CharDisplay(Line_Num, reference_column, *Sptr);
00478     /* Increment the column position by 16, because character is size of 16x24                              */
00479     reference_column += 16;
00480     /* Point to the next character                                                                          */
00481     Sptr++;
00482 
00483     /* Increase the character counter                                                                       */
00484     i++;
00485   }
00486 }
00487 
00488 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00489   * @brief  Draw one character.
00490   * @param  X_Location: the position of display line, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00491   * @param  Y_Location: the start position of character.
00492   * @param  Cptr: point to font data of character.
00493   * @retval None
00494   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00495 void LCD_CharDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u16 *Cptr)
00496 {
00497   u32 xid = X_Location;
00498   u32 i = 0, j = 0;
00499 
00500   LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00501 
00502   for (i = 0; i < Font_Raw; i++)
00503   {
00504     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00505     for (j = 0; j < Font_Column; j++)
00506     {
00507       if ((Cptr[i] & (1 << j)) == 0x00)
00508       {
00509         LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Back);
00510       }
00511       else
00512       {
00513         LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Text);
00514       }
00515     }
00516     xid++;
00517     LCD_StarterSet(xid, Y_Location);
00518   }
00519 }
00520 
00521 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00522   * @brief  Display a line.
00523   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00524   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00525   * @param  Length: line length.
00526   * @param  Direction: line direction.
00527   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00528   *     @arg Vertical
00529   *     @arg Horizontal
00530   * @retval None
00531   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00532 void LCD_LineDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Length, u32 Direction)
00533 {
00534   s32 i = 0;
00535 
00536   LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00537 
00538   if (Direction == Horizontal)
00539   {
00540     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00541     for (i = Length; i > 0; i--)
00542     {
00543       LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Text);
00544     }
00545   }
00546   else
00547   {
00548     for (i = Length; i > 0; i--)
00549     {
00550       LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00551       X_Location++;
00552       LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00553     }
00554   }
00555 }
00556 
00557 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00558   * @brief  Display a circle.
00559   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00560   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00561   * @param  Radius: radius of the circle.
00562   * @retval None
00563   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00564 void LCD_CircleDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Radius)
00565 {
00566   s32  DV;  // Decision Variable
00567   u32  X_Value;      // Current X Value
00568   u32  Y_Value;      // Current Y Value
00569 
00570   DV = 3 - (Radius << 1);
00571   X_Value = 0;
00572   Y_Value = Radius;
00573 
00574   while (X_Value <= Y_Value)
00575   {
00576     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + X_Value, Y_Location + Y_Value);
00577     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00578 
00579     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + X_Value, Y_Location - Y_Value);
00580     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00581 
00582     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - X_Value, Y_Location + Y_Value);
00583     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00584 
00585     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - X_Value, Y_Location - Y_Value);
00586     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00587 
00588     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + Y_Value, Y_Location + X_Value);
00589     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00590 
00591     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + Y_Value, Y_Location - X_Value);
00592     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00593 
00594     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - Y_Value, Y_Location + X_Value);
00595     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00596 
00597     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - Y_Value, Y_Location - X_Value);
00598     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00599 
00600     if (DV < 0)
00601     {
00602       DV += (X_Value << 2) + 6;
00603     }
00604     else
00605     {
00606       DV += ((X_Value - Y_Value) << 2) + 10;
00607       Y_Value--;
00608     }
00609     X_Value++;
00610   }
00611 }
00612 
00613 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00614   * @brief  Draw a rectangle.
00615   * @param  X_Location: X position.
00616   * @param  Y_Location: Y position.
00617   * @param  Height: rectangle height.
00618   * @param  Width: rectangle width.
00619   * @retval None
00620   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00621 void LCD_RectDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Height, u32 Width)
00622 {
00623   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location, Width, Horizontal);
00624   LCD_LineDraw((X_Location + Height), Y_Location, Width, Horizontal);
00625 
00626   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location, Height, Vertical);
00627   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location + Width - 1, Height, Vertical);
00628 }
00629 
00630 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00631   * @brief  Draw a picture.
00632   * @param  X_Location: X position.
00633   * @param  Y_Location: Y position.
00634   * @param  Height: rectangle height.
00635   * @param  Width: rectangle width.
00636   * @param  Pptr: point to pixel data of picture.
00637   * @retval None
00638   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00639 void LCD_PicDraw(u8 X_Location, u16 Y_Location, u8 Height, u16 Width, uc8 *Pptr)
00640 {
00641   u32 xid = 0;
00642   u32 ImgAdds = 0;
00643   u32 yid = 0;
00644   u32 i = 0, j = 0, color = 0;
00645 
00646   xid = Height + X_Location;
00647   yid = Y_Location;
00648   LCD_StarterSet(xid, yid);
00649 
00650   for (i = 0; i < Height; i++)
00651   {
00652     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00653 
00654     for (j = 0; j < Width; j++)
00655     {
00656       ImgAdds = (i * Width * 2) + (j * 2);
00657 
00658       color = Pptr[ImgAdds] << 8 | (Pptr[ImgAdds + 1]);
00659 
00660       LCD_WriteRAM(color);
00661     }
00662     xid--;
00663     LCD_StarterSet(xid, yid);
00664   }
00665 }
00666 
00667 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00668   * @brief  Write 1 word to the LCD RAM.
00669   * @param  RGB_Set: the pixel color in RGB mode (5-6-5).
00670   * @retval None
00671   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00672 void LCD_WriteRAMWord(u32 RGB_Set)
00673 {
00674   LCD_WriteRAMPrior();
00675 
00676   LCD_WriteRAM(RGB_Set);
00677 }
00678 
00679 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00680   * @brief  Set Display Area.
00681   * @param  Column:
00682   * @param  Page:
00683   * @param  Height:
00684   * @param  Width:
00685   * @retval None
00686   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00687 void LCD_SetDisplayArea(u16 Column, u16 Page, u16 Height, u16 Width)
00688 {
00689   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG2;
00690   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Page >> 8) & 0xFF;
00691 
00692   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG3;
00693   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Page & 0xFF);
00694 
00695   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG4;
00696   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = ((Page + Width-1) >> 8) & 0xFF;
00697 
00698   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG5;
00699   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Page + Width-1) & 0xFF;
00700 
00701   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG6;
00702   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Column >> 8) & 0xFF;
00703 
00704   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG7;
00705   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Column & 0xFF);
00706 
00707   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG8;
00708   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = ((Column + Height-1) >> 8) & 0xFF;
00709 
00710   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_REG = REG9;
00711   EBI_LCD->EBI_LCD_RAM = (Column + Height-1) & 0xFF;
00712 }
00713 /**
00714   * @}
00715   */
00716 
00717

00722 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00723   * @brief  Inserts a delay time.
00724   * @param  nCount: specifies the delay time length.
00725   * @retval None
00726   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00727 static void _delay(u32 nCount)
00728 {
00729   vu32 i;
00730 
00731   for (i = 0; i < 10000 * nCount; i++)
00732   {
00733   }
00734 }
00735 /**
00736   * @}
00737   */
00738

00740   * @}
00741   */
00742 
00743 /**
00744   * @}
00745   */
00746

00748   * @}
00749   */
